title: The Making of the Stooges
creator_credit: Mark S Gilman Jr and Operator 13 Productions
brief_description: Narrated by Steve Allen, this documentary traces the Three Stooges’ fifty year career from their earliest days as the “Three Lost Souls”. Comprising Larry Fine, Curly Howard, Moe Howard, the Three Stooges developed a wildly unique comic style and were regarded as the kings of slapstick comedy. Featuring rare performance footage and interviews with family, friends and co-workers.
